title: John MacArthur with Ben Shapiro, Jordan Peterson, Gretta Vosper, Neo-Sacramentalism in the IDW
description:
Conservative Reformed Christians were in a tizzy over John MacArthur with Ben Shapiro. Would Mac be able to flip Ben to the Jesus side? What are the cultural, historical relationships at play? Why is Ben the only theist in the IDW? Can we talk about complicated theological relationships and movements beyond tribal cheerleading? 

Ben Shapiro Sunday Show with MacArthur https://youtu.be/F-ofKxfYqGw

Religious People are Nerds https://youtu.be/gNtnN_DiP3o

United Church says they still believe in God https://www.united-church.ca/news/united-church-canada-responds-joint-statement-rev-vosper

Jordan Peterson on a panel with Gretta Vosper https://youtu.be/48V0m2lia5U 

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
